item.title: How can i make people admins if i a owner!
item.dc:creator: @Pure_pk1 Puré_pk
item.description:
@Pure_pk1 wrote:

or you can go to character then press on that acc you wish to make admin
then there is something like Player rights - 0 change it to 2

  1. normal

  2. mod

2)admin

3)owner of the server

item.source: How can i make people admins if i a owner!

item.title: How can i make people admins if i a owner!
item.dc:creator: @Roderick2007 Roderick2007
item.description:
@Roderick2007 wrote:

What source are you using??? uually go into client.java press ctrl+f
and search for “staff”
keep going untill you find somethign like this

1—>moderator 2—>admin 3----->owner

then you will see something liike ("")

in betwen the " type the name in of who you want to be an admin

you should see player rights —> 1,2 or 3

1= p mod (silver crown)
2=admin (gold crown)
3= owner (godl crown)

then once you’ve changed that save it
go into your characters folder
loook for the name you’ve mad a admin/mod in your client
open that file up and change the rights to whatever you’ve made it to

save + compile…easy
